attributes.action: Stop all travel to red list countries. The quarrantine hotels are not required
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair for people to pay for these hotels. The cost of holidays is high enough wothout having to pay for these hotels. The potential spread of COVID could be reduced as even if people want to travel and pay for the hotel they will not be able to
attributes.background: Stop all travel to the countries identified on the red list relating to COVID. Imposing hotels would not be required if this was carried out

rejection.details: Quarantine hotels are required for people returning from, not travelling to, 'red list' countries. We're therefore not sure whether you want people returning from these countries not to be subject to any form of quarantine.
